mbands.name: amywinehouse
mbands.LatestAlbum: latest album : Amy Winehouse at The BBC
mbands.LatestAlbuminformation: Amy Winehouse at the BBC is a posthumous live album by English singer and songwriter Amy Winehouse.

mbands.name: The xx
mbands.LatestAlbuminformation: I See You was described by AnyDecentMusic? as an album of indie rock and dream pop music, while Matt Hobbs from God Is in the TV said the xx expanded on the dance portion of their usual fusion of indie and alternative dance sounds.
